sub_fields.label: Column Proportion
sub_fields.name: columns
sub_fields.instructions: Enter the width of this column as a proportion of the grid (maximum 12 columns).

sub_fields.label: Alternate Format
sub_fields.name: alternate_format
sub_fields.instructions: Story list appears below hero image

sub_fields.label: Primary Category
sub_fields.name: primary_category
sub_fields.instructions: Select the category you wish to appear in the category tag.

sub_fields.label: Content Block 1
sub_fields.name: content_1
sub_fields.instructions: Add the top right secondary featured content block

sub_fields.label: Story Background Overlay
sub_fields.name: background_gradient
sub_fields.instructions: Add a background gradient to make text easier to read.

sub_fields.label: Content Block 2
sub_fields.name: content_2
sub_fields.instructions: Add the bottom left secondary featured content block

sub_fields.label: Story Background Overlay
sub_fields.name: background_gradient
sub_fields.instructions: Add a gradient to light-colored background images to make text easier to read.

sub_fields.label: Content Block 3
sub_fields.name: content_3
sub_fields.instructions: Add the bottom right secondary featured content block

sub_fields.label: Story Background Overlay
sub_fields.name: background_gradient
sub_fields.instructions: Add a gradient to light-colored background images to make text easier to read.

sub_fields.label: Columns
sub_fields.name: columns
sub_fields.instructions: Enter number of columns (of a possible 12) to determine proportion of the page width the statistic takes up

sub_fields.label: Profile Type
sub_fields.name: profile_type
sub_fields.instructions: Text that appears in the category tag.

fields.label: Hide Featured Image
fields.name: hide_featured_image
fields.instructions: Hides the featured image from single post view.

fields.label: Full Width Featured Image
fields.name: full_width_featured_image
fields.instructions: Image will use 100% of the allowed width in single post view.

sub_fields.label: Pull Latest From Category With Image
sub_fields.name: pull_latest_from_category

sub_fields.label: Sort By
sub_fields.name: sort_by
sub_fields.instructions: Choose the field you want to sort by.
